Clean Project

Source: R/rProject-clean-proj.R
CleanProj.Rd

Remove all files except project.Rproj and, optionally, .library.

Usage

CleanProj(path, lib = FALSE, sim = FALSE, sif = FALSE)

Arguments

path

Character string. Project path.

lib

Logical. If lib = TRUE, delete .library. If lib = FALSE, .library is not deleted.

sim

Logical. If sim = TRUE, delete .sim. If sim = FALSE, .sim is not deleted.

sif

Logical. If sif = TRUE, delete .sif. If sif = FALSE, .sif is not deleted.

Author

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan
